items.title: South African farm worker says he was forced to feed women to pigs
items.description: At the start of a murder trial, a farm supervisor says his boss ordered him to dispose of two women's bodies.

items.title: Irish missionary and child, 3, among nine kidnapped from Haiti orphanage
items.description: Gena Heraty and a three-year-old child were taken in the middle of the night in a "planned act", officials say.

items.title: Hundreds of Israeli ex-officials appeal to Trump to help end Gaza war
items.description: It comes amid reports that PM Netanyahu is pushing to expand Israel's military operations in Gaza.

items.title: Soulja Boy arrested on suspicion of weapons charges
items.description: He was arrested during a traffic stop on suspicion of possession of a firearm while being a felon.

items.title: Watch: Florida police officer removes alligator from family's pool with bare hands
items.description: The reptile was retrieved by the officer and buckled into the back of a police car.
